articles.title: Thunder-Pacers: 5 takeaways as Jalen Williams carries OKC to brink of 1st championship
articles.description: Jalen Williams scores 40 points in a masterful performance as OKC moves within 1 win of its 1st NBA championship.
articles.content:
What we’re witnessing in this series is a co-star methodically nudging his way into a starring role. This transition by Williams is now on skates after his latest, and greatest, performance of the Finals.

articles.title: Jail for man who forged signatures in letters on fire safety over NLB renovation works
articles.description: Ma Lai Fatt said he committed the offences to get the job done more quickly.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE: An employee of a project consultant who wanted to "finish the job quicker" used the signature of a professional engineer on documents concerning fire safety requirements without the engineer's permission.

articles.title: Remains found near Good Night Scrub National Park confirmed to be missing Bundaberg teen Pheobe Bishop
articles.description: The 17-year-old’s housemates have been charged with her murder.
articles.content:
Human remains found earlier this month are missing Bundaberg teenager Pheobe Bishop, her family and police have confirmed.
